text: Richard Harmon "Dick" Fulton (January 27, 1927 - November 28, 2018) was a Democratic politician. He served as a member of the Tennessee State Senate and of the United States House of Representatives, and the second mayor of the Metropolitan Government of Nashville, Tennessee. Fulton died on November 28, 2018 under hospice care in Nashville at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Mayors of Nashville, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard Fulton
